title: Hardrockers prepare for hard road test
text:
Hardrockers prepare for hard road test POSTED: 06:00 PM MDT Oct 22, 2015 UPDATED: 06:35 PM MDT Oct 23, 2015 
South Dakota Mines Football takes on Azuza Pacific tomorrow. Vic Quick meets up with head coach Stacy Collins and tight end Cameron Luna before the road match.
